Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Brewers face off against the St. Louis Cardinals on September 2, 2024, at 2:10 PM EDT.
The Brewers have dominated the season series, winning 7 out of 10 matchups so far.
The Cardinals showcased a powerful offense in their last outing, defeating the New York Yankees 14-7.
The pitching matchup features Andre Pallante (6-6, 3.80 ERA) for St. Louis against Freddy Peralta (9-7, 3.70 ERA) for Milwaukee.
